MS.S: Microsoft Azure PowerShell - Cmdlets to manage resources in Azure. This module is compatible with WindowsPowerShell and PowerShell Core._x000D__x000A_For more information about the Az module, please visit the following: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/azure/

4.7.0 - September 2020_x000D__x000A_Az.Accounts_x000D__x000A_* Formatted the upcoming breaking change messages_x000D__x000A_* Updated Azure.Core to 1.4.1_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Az.Aks_x000D__x000A_* Added client side parameter validation logic for 'New-AzAksCluster', 'Set-AzAksCluster' and 'New-AzAksNodePool'. [#12372]_x000D__x000A_* Added support for add-ons in 'New-AzAksCluster'. [#11239]_x000D__x000A_* Added cmdlets 'Enable-AzAksAddOn' and 'Disable-AzAksAddOn' for add-ons. [#11239]_x000D__x000A_* Added parameter 'GenerateSshKey' for 'New-AzAksCluster'. [#12371]_x000D__x000A_* Updated api version to 2020-06-01._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Az.CognitiveServices_x000D__x000A_* Showed additional legal terms for certain APIs._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Az.Compute_x000D__x000A_* Added the '-EncryptionType' optional parameter to 'New-AzVmDiskEncryptionSetConfig'_x000D__x000A_* New cmdlets for new resource type: DiskAccess 'Get-AzDiskAccess', 'New-AzDiskAccess', 'Get-AzDiskAccess'_x000D__x000A_* Added optional parameters '-DiskAccessId' and '-NetworkAccessPolicy' to 'New-AzSnapshotConfig'_x000D__x000A_* Added optional parameters '-DiskAccessId' and '-NetworkAccessPolicy' to 'New-AzDiskConfig'_x000D__x000A_* Added 'PatchStatus' property to VirtualMachine Instance View_x000D__x000A_* Added 'VMHealth' property to the virtual machine's instance view, which is the returned object when 'Get-AzVm' is invoked with '-Status'_x000D__x000A_* Added 'AssignedHost' field to 'Get-AzVM' and 'Get-AzVmss' instance views. The field shows the resource id of the virtual machine instance_x000D__x000A_* Added optional parameter '-SupportAutomaticPlacement' to 'New-AzHostGroup' _x000D__x000A_* Added the '-HostGroupId' parameter to 'New-AzVm' and 'New-AzVmss'_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Az.DataFactory_x000D__x000A_* Updated ADF .Net SDK version to 4.11.0_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Az.EventHub_x000D__x000A_* Added new Cluster cmdlets - 'New-AzEventHubCluster', 'Set-AzEventHubCluster', 'Get-AzEventHubCluster', 'Remove-AzEventHubCluster', 'Get-AzEventHubClustersAvailableRegions'._x000D__x000A_* Fixed for issue #10722 : Fix for assigning only 'Listen' to AuthorizationRule rights._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Az.Functions_x000D__x000A_* Removed the ability to create v2 Functions in regions that do not support it._x000D__x000A_* Deprecated PowerShell 6.2. Added a warning for when a user creates a PowerShell 6.2 function app that advises them to create a PowerShell 7.0 function app instead._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Az.HDInsight_x000D__x000A_* Supported creating cluster with Autoscale configuration_x000D__x000A_ - Add new parameter 'AutoscaleConfiguration' to the cmdlet 'New-AzHDInsightCluster'_x000D__x000A_* Supported operating cluster's Autoscale configuration_x000D__x000A_ - Add new cmdlet 'Get-AzHDInsihgtClusterAutoscaleConfiguration'_x000D__x000A_ - Add new cmdlet 'New-AzHDInsihgtClusterAutoscaleConfiguration'_x000D__x000A_ - Add new cmdlet 'Set-AzHDInsihgtClusterAutoscaleConfiguration'_x000D__x000A_ - Add new cmdlet 'Remove-AzHDInsihgtClusterAutoscaleConfiguration'_x000D__x000A_ - Add new cmdlet 'New-AzHDInsihgtClusterAutoscaleScheduleCondition'_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Az.KeyVault_x000D__x000A_* Added support for RBAC authorization [#10557]_x000D__x000A_* Enhanced error handling in 'Set-AzKeyVaultAccessPolicy' [#4007]_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Az.Kusto_x000D__x000A_* General availability of 'Az.Kusto' module_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Az.Network_x000D__x000A_* [Breaking Change] Updated below cmdlets to align resource virtual router and virtual hub_x000D__x000A_ - 'New-AzVirtualRouter'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Get-AzVirtualRouter'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Remove-AzVirtualRouter'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Add-AzVirtualRouterPeer'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Get-AzVirtualRouterPeer'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Remove-AzVirtualRouterPeer'_x000D__x000A_* Added new cmdlet for Azure Express Route Port_x000D__x000A_ - 'New-AzExpressRoutePortLOA'_x000D__x000A_* Added RemoteBgpCommunities property to the VirtualNetwork Peering Resource_x000D__x000A_* Modified the warning message for 'New-AzLoadBalancerFrontendIpConfig', 'New-AzPublicIpAddress' and 'New-AzPublicIpPrefix'._x000D__x000A_* Added VpnGatewayIpConfigurations to 'Get-AzVpnGateway' output_x000D__x000A_* Fixed bug for 'Set-AzApplicationGatewaySslCertificate' [#9488]_x000D__x000A_* Added 'AllowActiveFTP' parameter to 'AzureFirewall'_x000D__x000A_* Updated below commands for feature: Enable internet security set/remove on VirtualWan P2SVpnGateway._x000D__x000A_- Updated 'New-AzP2sVpnGateway': Added optional switch parameter 'EnableInternetSecurityFlag' for customers to set true to enable internet security on P2SVpnGateway, which will be applied for Point to site clients._x000D__x000A_- Updated 'Update-AzP2sVpnGateway': Added optional switch parameters 'EnableInternetSecurityFlag' or 'DisableInternetSecurityFlag' for customers to set true/false to enable/disable internet security on P2SVpnGateway, which will be applied for Point to site clients._x000D__x000A_* Added new cmdlet 'Reset-AzP2sVpnGateway' for customers to reset/reboot their VirtualWan P2SVpnGateway for troubleshooting._x000D__x000A_* Added new cmdlet 'Reset-AzVpnGateway' for customers to reset/reboot their VirtualWan VpnGateway for troubleshooting._x000D__x000A_* Updated 'Set-AzVirtualNetworkSubnetConfig'_x000D__x000A_ - Set NSG and Route Table properties of subnet to null if explicitly set in parameters [#1548][#9718]_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Az.RecoveryServices_x000D__x000A_* Fixed the Delete State for workload Backup Items._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Az.Resources_x000D__x000A_* Added missing check for Set-AzRoleAssignment_x000D__x000A_* Added breaking change attribute to 'SubscriptionId' parameter of 'Get-AzResourceGroupDeploymentOperation'_x000D__x000A_* Updated ARM template What-If cmdlets to show 'Ignore' resource changes last_x000D__x000A_* Fixed secure and array parameter serialization issues for deployment cmdlets [#12773]_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Az.ServiceFabric_x000D__x000A_* Added new cmdlets for managed clusters and node types:_x000D__x000A_ - 'New-AzServiceFabricManagedCluster'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Get-AzServiceFabricManagedCluster'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Set-AzServiceFabricManagedCluster'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Remove-AzServiceFabricManagedCluster'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Add-AzServiceFabricManagedClusterClientCertificate'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Remove-AzServiceFabricManagedClusterClientCertificate'_x000D__x000A_ - 'New-AzServiceFabricManagedNodeType'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Get-AzServiceFabricManagedNodeType'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Set-AzServiceFabricManagedNodeType'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Remove-AzServiceFabricManagedNodeType'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Add-AzServiceFabricManagedNodeTypeVMExtension'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Add-AzServiceFabricManagedNodeTypeVMSecret'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Remove-AzServiceFabricManagedNodeTypeVMExtension'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Restart-AzServiceFabricManagedNodeTyp'_x000D__x000A_* Upgraded Service Fabric SDK to version 1.2.0 which uses service fabric resource provider api-version 2020-03-01 for the current model and 2020-01-01-preview for managed clusters._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Az.Sql_x000D__x000A_* Added BackupStorageRedundancy to 'New-AzSqlInstance' and 'Get-AzSqlInstance'_x000D__x000A_* Added cmdlet 'Get-AzSqlServerActiveDirectoryOnlyAuthentication'_x000D__x000A_* Added cmdlet 'Enable-AzSqlServerActiveDirectoryOnlyAuthentication'_x000D__x000A_* Added Force parameter to 'New-AzSqlInstance'_x000D__x000A_* Added cmdlets for Managed Database Log Replay service_x000D__x000A__x0009_- 'Start-AzSqlInstanceDatabaseLogReplay'_x000D__x000A__x0009_- 'Get-AzSqlInstanceDatabaseLogReplay'_x000D__x000A__x0009_- 'Complete-AzSqlInstanceDatabaseLogReplay'_x000D__x000A__x0009_- 'Stop-AzSqlInstanceDatabaseLogReplay'_x000D__x000A_* Added cmdlet 'Get-AzSqlInstanceActiveDirectoryOnlyAuthentication'_x000D__x000A_* Added cmdlet 'Enable-AzSqlInstanceActiveDirectoryOnlyAuthentication'_x000D__x000A_* Added cmdlet 'Disable-AzSqlInstanceActiveDirectoryOnlyAuthentication'_x000D__x000A_* Updated cmdlets 'New-AzSqlDatabaseImport' and 'New-AzSqlDatabaseExport' to support network isolation functionality_x000D__x000A_* Added cmdlet 'New-AzSqlDatabaseImportExisting'_x000D__x000A_* Updated Databases cmdlets to support backup storage type specification_x000D__x000A_* Added Force parameter to 'New-AzSqlDatabase'_x000D__x000A_* Added warning for BackupStorageRedundancy configuration in select regions in 'New-AzSqlDatabase'_x000D__x000A_* Updated ActiveDirectoryOnlyAuthentication cmdlets for server and instance to include ResourceId and InputObject_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Az.Storage_x000D__x000A_* Fixed upload blob fail by upgrade to Microsoft.Azure.Storage.DataMovement 2.0.0 [#12220]_x000D__x000A_* Supported Point In Time Restore_x000D__x000A_ - 'Enable-AzStorageBlobRestorePolicy'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Disable-AzStorageBlobRestorePolicy'_x000D__x000A_ - 'New-AzStorageBlobRangeToRestore'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Restore-AzStorageBlobRange'_x000D__x000A_* Supported get blob restore status of Storage account by run get-AzureRMStorageAccount with parameter -IncludeBlobRestoreStatus _x000D__x000A_ - 'Get-AzureRMStorageAccount'_x000D__x000A_* Added breaking change warning message for upcoming cmdlet output change_x000D__x000A_ - 'Get-AzStorageContainerStoredAccessPolicy'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Set-AzStorageContainerStoredAccessPolicy'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Set-AzStorageAccountManagementPolicy'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Get-AzStorageAccountManagementPolicy'_x000D__x000A_ - 'Add-AzStorageAccountManagementPolicyAction'_x000D__x000A_ - 'New-AzStorageAccountManagementPolicyRule'_x000D__x000A_* Upgraded Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Table SDK to 1.0.8

Microsoft Azure PowerShell - Cmdlets to manage resources in Azure. This module is compatible with WindowsPowerShell and PowerShell Core._x000D__x000A_For more information about the Az module, please visit the following: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/azure/
